result.eng: And anyway, does it matter?
result.ga: Agus ar scor ar bith nach cuma
result.orig: Agus ar scor ar bith nach cuma
result.html: Agus ar scor ar bith nach cumaAnd anyway, does it matter?
result.ponchtml: Agus ar scor ar biṫ naċ cumaAnd anyway, does it matter?

result.eng: It doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ga: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.orig: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.html: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a ċoṁairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.

result.eng: He does not care what I did.
result.ga: Is cuma leis cad a rinne mé
result.orig: Is cuma leis cad a rinne mé
result.html: Is cuma leis cad a rinne méHe does not care what I did.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma leis cad a rinne méHe does not care what I did.

result.eng: I don't care what people think.
result.ga: Is cuma liom cad a cheapann daoine
result.orig: Is cuma liom cad a cheapann daoine
result.html: Is cuma liom cad a cheapann daoineI don't care what people think.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma liom cad a ċeapann daoineI don't care what people think.

result.eng: I don't care about the small technical diffrences.

result.html: Is cuma liom faoi na miondifríochtaí teicniúlaI don't care about the small technical diffrences.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma liom faoi na miondifríoċtaí teicniúlaI don't care about the small technical diffrences.

result.eng: I don't care!

result.orig: Is cuma liom
result.html: Is cuma liomI don't care!
result.ponchtml: Is cuma liomI don't care!

result.eng: It doesn't bloody matter where he is!

result.ponchtml: Is cuma sa diaḃal cá ḃfuil séIt doesn't bloody matter where he is!

result.eng: It seems that it will be easy.
result.ga: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éasca
result.orig: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éasca
result.html: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éascaIt seems that it will be easy.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuma ar an scéal go mbeiḋ sé éascaIt seems that it will be easy.

result.eng: It seems that not many jobs are available.

result.eng: It looks strange.
result.ga: Tá cuma aisteach air
result.orig: Tá cuma aisteach air

result.eng: It looks good.

result.eng: It looks like rain.

result.eng: The website you made looks good.

result.eng: The wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.

result.eng: They would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.

result.eng: But many of them look tired now.

result.eng: All you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
